name: Simple Squares
description:
Simple Squares is as simple game with minimalistic features. The objective is to simply dodge the squares using the left and right arrow keys. And enjoy the music.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move

Press D key to Delete your highscore. Then restart the application.

Esc Key to Exit to the menu

If you run into any issues in the game, then fill out the form below.

http://goo.gl/forms/oJNAHqx41S
